a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global reported natural disasters by type, 1970 to 2019
The annual reported number of natural disasters, categorised by type. This includes both weather and non-weather
Source: EMDAT (2020): OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Universit catholique de Louvain Brussels Belgium
